sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Search, Users, Building2, Briefcase, Shield, Clock, MapPin, TrendingUp, CheckCircle, Star, ArrowRight, Phone, Mail, MessageCircle, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; const LandingPage = () => { const [selectedRole, setSelectedRole] = useState(''); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Smart Job Matching', description: 'AI-powered matching connects workers with the right jobs based on skills, location, and preferences.' }, { icon: , title: 'Verified Profiles', description: 'All workers and employers go through verification to ensure safety and reliability.' }, { icon: , title: 'Quick Hiring', description: 'Fill positions within hours, not days. Our platform streamlines the entire hiring process.' }, { icon: , title: 'Local Focus', description: 'Connect with workers and employers in your area for better coordination and reduced costs.' }, { icon: , title: 'Growth Opportunities', description: 'Workers can build their reputation and employers can find reliable talent consistently.' }, { icon: , title: 'Community Building', description: 'Join a network of skilled professionals and reputable employers across India.' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10,000+', label: 'Verified Workers' }, { number: '500+', label: 'Active Employers' }, { number: '50,000+', label: 'Jobs Completed' }, { number: '95%', label: 'Satisfaction Rate' } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: 'Rajesh Kumar', role: 'Construction Worker', content: 'Found great jobs through this platform. The verification system gives me confidence in employers.', rating: 5 }, { name: 'Priya Sharma', role: 'HR Manager, ABC Construction', content: 'We\'ve reduced our hiring time from weeks to days. The quality of workers is excellent.', rating: 5 }, { name: 'Amit Patel', role: 'Logistics Worker', content: 'Easy to use, reliable payments, and good support. Highly recommended for workers.', rating: 5 } ]; const handleRoleSelect = (role) => { setSelectedRole(role); }; return ( <> Labour Marketplace - Connect Workers & Employers | Find Jobs & Talent {/* Hero Section */}
India's Leading Labour Marketplace Connect skilled workers with reliable employers. Find jobs, hire talent, and grow your business with our verified platform. handleRoleSelect('worker')} className="bg-yellow-500 hover:bg-yellow-600 text-blue-900 font-semibold px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center gap-2" > Find Jobs as Worker handleRoleSelect('employer')} className="bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-blue-900 font-semibold px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center gap-2" > Hire Workers as Employer
{/* Wave decoration */}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Our Platform?

We've built the most comprehensive labour marketplace in India with features designed for both workers and employers.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Get started in minutes with our simple 3-step process

{[ { step: '01', title: 'Create Profile', description: 'Sign up and complete your profile with skills, experience, and preferences.' }, { step: '02', title: 'Find & Connect', description: 'Browse jobs or post requirements. Our AI matches you with the best opportunities.' }, { step: '03', title: 'Work & Earn', description: 'Complete jobs, get paid, and build your reputation on the platform.' } ].map((item, index) => (
{item.step}

{item.title}

{item.description}

))}
{/* Features Section */}

Platform Features

Everything you need to manage your workforce and grow your business

Marketplace

Find jobs, workers, and companies with advanced search and filters

Explore Marketplace →

Attendance & Payout

QR code check-ins, face recognition, and automated wage calculations

Manage Attendance →

Trust & Safety

KYC verification, skill badges, insurance, and dispute resolution

Learn More →

Analytics

Comprehensive dashboards for workers, employers, and administrators

Get Started →
{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Our Users Say

Join thousands of satisfied workers and employers who trust our platform

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.content}"

{testimonial.name}
{testimonial.role}
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of workers and employers who are already using our platform to grow their businesses and careers.

handleRoleSelect('worker')} className="bg-yellow-500 hover:bg-yellow-600 text-blue-900 font-semibold px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center gap-2" > Join as Worker handleRoleSelect('employer')} className="bg-white hover:bg-gray-100 text-blue-900 font-semibold px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-200 flex items-center justify-center gap-2" > Join as Employer
{/* Contact Section */}

Get in Touch

Have questions? Our support team is here to help you get started.

Phone Support

+91 98765 43210

Mon-Sat: 9AM-6PM

Email Support

support@labourmarketplace.com

24/7 response

Live Chat

Available on website

Instant support

); }; export default LandingPage;
